title: Weather Clock
answer:
You can manually update the weather on the home screen interface by clicking Update Time 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110268)

 Enter the Weather app: 

 Click the icon indicating weather on the home screen or select Weather in the home menu 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110269)

 Enter the Clock app: 

 Click Clock Position on the home screen, or select the clock on the home menu. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110270)
